local_intent: Place the held white_plate onto red_plate: detect red plate, move above and align, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, retreat and wait.
assumptions: White plate is currently held in the gripper (from prior pick).
Robot is positioned near/above the red_plate such that MoveAbove and ApproachAndAlign can succeed.
Perception can detect 'red_plate' in this frame.
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase of the GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: it performs perception, fine alignment, lowers until contact (LOCAL_ANNOTATION), verifies contact, releases the object by opening the gripper, then retreats and waits.
